## Line Chart


```{r}
library(chartr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(dplyr)

# Prepare summarized data
penguins_summary <- penguins %>%
  filter(!is.na(body_mass_g)) %>%
  group_by(year, species, island) %>%
  summarise(body_mass_g = mean(body_mass_g), .groups = "drop")

penguins_summary$year <- as.factor(penguins_summary$year)
```

```{r}
# 1️⃣ Base line chart (lines only)
line_chart(
  data = penguins_summary,
  x = year,
  y = body_mass_g,
  group = species,
  title = "Base Line Chart",
  legend_title = "Species"
)
```

```{r}
# Full stress test (all features)
line_chart(
  data = penguins_summary,
  x = as.factor(year),
  y = body_mass_g,
  group = species,
  facet = island,
  title = "Full Component Stress Test",
  x_label = "Year",
  y_label = "Body Mass (g)",
  legend_title = "Species",
  legend_position = "bottom",
  legend_direction = "horizontal",
  note = "Data: Palmer Penguins",
  facet_scales = "free_y",
  facet_ncol = 3,
  show_points = TRUE,
  point_shape = c(16, 17, 15),
  point_size = 2,
  line_size = 1,
  show_labels = TRUE,
  label_size = 3
)
```
